forgot-password-paragraph: Enter the email associated with your account and we'll send an email with instructions to reset your password.
please-check-your-email-to-reset-your-pa: Please check your email to reset your password.
aggrement-1: We want you to know exactly how EGAT P2P app work and why we need your details. Reviewing our policy will help you continue using the app with peace of mind
privacy-1: What information do we collect about you?
privacy-2: How do we use your informaion?
privacy-3: To whom do we disclose your information?
privacy-4: What do we do to keep your information secure?
map-contacted: If your location does not match in map, please contact us
otp-has-been-sent: One Time Password (OTP) has been sent to your mobile number
otp-has-been-sent-email: One Time Password (OTP) has been sent to your email
thanks-created-account: Thanks! Your account has been successfully created.
